argumentText:

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` W ) = ( +g ` W ) |

| 15 | 1, 13, 2, 3, 9, 14 | #P_lmodvsdir | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( O e. ( Base ` F ) /\ O e. ( Base ` F ) /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( ( O ( +g ` F ) O ) .x. X ) = ( ( O .x. X ) ( +g ` W ) ( O .x. X ) ) ) |
| 16 | 6, 11, 11, 12, 15 | #P_syl13anc | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( O ( +g ` F ) O ) .x. X ) = ( ( O .x. X ) ( +g ` W ) ( O .x. X ) ) ) |

| 25 | 1, 13, 5 | #P_lmod0vid | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( O .x. X ) e. V ) -> ( ( ( O .x. X ) ( +g ` W ) ( O .x. X ) ) = ( O .x. X ) <-> .0. = ( O .x. X ) ) ) |
| 26 | 24, 25 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( ( O .x. X ) ( +g ` W ) ( O .x. X ) ) = ( O .x. X ) <-> .0. = ( O .x. X ) ) ) |
